verses.roman:
kṛṣṇa-āliṅgana pāinu, janama saphale
kṛṣṇa-sukhe magna rahe vṛkṣa kari' kole

synonyms: kṛṣṇa—of Lord Kṛṣṇa; āliṅgana—the embrace; pāinu—I have gotten; janama sa-phale—My birth is now fulfilled; kṛṣṇa-sukhe—in the matter of pleasing Kṛṣṇa; magna—immersed; rahe—She remains; vṛkṣa—the tree; kari'-taking; kole—on the lap.
translation: " 'I have gotten the embrace of Śrī Kṛṣṇa,' She thinks, 'so now My life is fulfilled.' Thus She remains immersed in pleasing Kṛṣṇa, taking the tree in Her arms.
